thread.title: Newcomer Yami Gautam says she cant be choosy in roles
thread.title_full: Newcomer Yami Gautam says she cant be choosy in roles

title: Newcomer Yami Gautam says she cant be choosy in roles
text:
'Newcomer' Yami Gautam says she can't be choosy in roles 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Thursday 15th October, 2015 
Bollywood actress Yami Gautam recently claimed that she is a newcomer in the entertainment industry after she was asked whether she has become choosy in her work. 
The 26-year-old actress was spotted at the launch of Moonlight collection of Titan Raga in Mumbai where she said, "I can't be choosy in my work because I am a newcomer and it is just the beginning." 
The 'Vicky Donor' star, who is equally seen in Telugu and Hindi movies, continued that she was last seen in 'Badlapur' and the movie did really well at the box-office adding that she will be next seen in an intense love story on Valentine's next year. 
Yami is currently shooting for a Tamil film as well titled 'Tamilselvanum Thaniyar Anjalum'. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
